## Source: ossf-package-analysis (71193da54e6cdc258489d02db5987830a3bc147cbf9b43236f5757cab04f9c73)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pp-react-grid' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
